history.proof: intros. unfold is_RInt_gen in *. apply is_RInt_gen_ext with (f0:=fun y : R => scal k (f y)); auto. - shelve. - shelve.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
V: NormedModule R_AbsRing
Fb: (R -> Prop) -> Prop
Fa: (R -> Prop) -> Prop
FFa: Filter Fa
FFb: Filter Fb
f: R -> V
k: R
l: NormedModule.sort R_AbsRing V

Goal:
is_RInt_gen f Fa Fb l -> is_RInt_gen (fun y : R => scal k (f y)) Fa Fb (scal k l)

Premises:
Notation NormedModule := NormedModule.type
AbelianGroup.sort = fun t : AbelianGroup => let (sort, _, _) := t in sort : AbelianGroup -> Type AbelianGroup.sort is a coercion
R_AbsRing = AbsRing.Pack R {| AbsRing.base := {| Ring.base := R_AbelianGroup_mixin; Ring.mixin := R_Ring_mixin |}; AbsRing.mixin := R_AbsRing_mixin |} R : AbsRing
Record Filter (T : Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) : Prop := Build_Filter { filter_true : F (fun _ : T => True); filter_and : forall P Q : T -> Prop, F P -> F Q -> F (fun x : T => P x /\ Q x); filter_imp : forall P Q : T -> Prop, (forall x : T, P x -> Q x) -> F P -> F Q } For Filter: Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted For Filter: Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope] For Build_Filter: Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope _ function_scope function_scope]
scal = fun (K : Ring) (V : ModuleSpace K) => ModuleSpace.scal K (AbelianGroup.Pack V (ModuleSpace.class K V) V) (ModuleSpace.class K V) : forall (K : Ring) (V : ModuleSpace K), K -> V -> V Arguments K, V are implicit and maximally inserted
is_RInt_gen = fun (f : R -> V) (Fa Fb : (R -> Prop) -> Prop) (l : V) => filterlimi (fun ab : R * R => is_RInt f (fst ab) (snd ab)) (filter_prod Fa Fb) (locally l) : (R -> V) -> ((R -> Prop) -> Prop) -> ((R -> Prop) -> Prop) -> V -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope function_scope function_scope _]
*** [ R : Set ]
is_RInt_gen_Chasles : forall (f0 : R -> V) (b : R) (l1 l2 : V), is_RInt_gen f0 ?Fa (at_point b) l1 -> is_RInt_gen f0 (at_point b) ?Fc l2 -> is_RInt_gen f0 ?Fa ?Fc (plus l1 l2) where ?Fa : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing Fa : (R -> Prop) -> Prop Fb : (R -> Prop) -> Prop FFa : Filter Fa FFb : Filter Fb f : R -> V k : R l : V |- (R -> Prop) -> Prop] ?Fc : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing Fa : (R -> Prop) -> Prop Fb : (R -> Prop) -> Prop FFa : Filter Fa FFb : Filter Fb f : R -> V k : R l : V |- (R -> Prop) ->...-> V k : R l : V |- Filter ?Fc]
is_RInt_gen_swap : forall (f0 : R -> V) (l0 : V), is_RInt_gen f0 ?Fb ?Fa l0 -> is_RInt_gen f0 ?Fa ?Fb (opp l0) where ?Fa : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing Fa : (R -> Prop) -> Prop Fb : (R -> Prop) -> Prop FFa : Filter Fa FFb : Filter Fb f : R -> V k : R l : V |- (R -> Prop) -> Prop] ?Fb : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing Fa : (R -> Prop) -> Prop Fb : (R -> Prop) -> Prop FFa : Filter Fa FFb : Filter Fb f : R -> V k : R l : V |- (R -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FFa : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing Fa : (R -> Prop) -> Prop Fb : (R -> Prop) ->...-> V k : R l : V |- Filter ?Fb]
is_RInt_gen_ext : forall (f0 g : R -> V) (l0 : V), filter_prod ?Fa ?Fb (fun ab : R * R => forall x : R, Rmin (fst ab) (snd ab) < x < Rmax (fst ab) (snd ab) -> f0 x = g x) -> is_RInt_gen f0 ?Fa ?Fb l0 -> is_RInt_gen g ?Fa ?Fb l0 where ?Fa : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing Fa : (R -> Prop) -> Prop Fb : (R -> Prop) -> Prop FFa : Filter Fa FFb : Filter Fb f : R -> V k : R l : V |- (R -> Prop) -> Prop] ?Fb : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing Fa : (R -> Prop) -> Prop Fb : (R -> Prop) -> Prop FFa : Filter Fa FFb : Filter Fb f : R ->...-> V k : R l : V |- Filter ?Fb]
scal_assoc : forall (x y : ?K) (u : ?V), scal x (scal y u) = scal (mult x y) u where ?K : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing Fa : (R -> Prop) -> Prop Fb : (R -> Prop) -> Prop FFa : Filter Fa FFb : Filter Fb f : R -> V k : R l : V |- Ring] ?V : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing Fa : (R -> Prop) -> Prop Fb : (R -> Prop) -> Prop FFa : Filter Fa FFb : Filter Fb f : R -> V k : R l : V |- ModuleSpace ?K]

is_RInt_scal : forall (f0 : R -> ?V) (a b k0 : R) (If : ?V), is_RInt f0 a b If -> is_RInt (fun y : R => scal k0 (f0 y)) a b (scal k0 If) where ?V : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing Fa : (R -> Prop) -> Prop Fb : (R -> Prop) -> Prop FFa : Filter Fa FFb : Filter Fb f : R -> V k : R l : V |- NormedModule R_AbsRing]

filter_forall : forall P : ?T -> Prop, (forall x : ?T, P x) -> ?F P where ?T : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing Fa : (R -> Prop) -> Prop Fb : (R -> Prop) -> Prop FFa : Filter Fa FFb : Filter Fb f : R -> V k : R l : V |- Type] ?F : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing Fa : (R -> Prop) -> Prop Fb : (R -> Prop) -> Prop FFa : Filter Fa FFb : Filter Fb f : R -> V k : R l : V |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing Fa : (R -> Prop) -> Prop Fb : (R -> Prop) -> Prop FFa : Filter Fa FFb : Filter Fb f : R -> V k : R l : V |- Filter ?F]
Filter_prod : forall (F : (?T -> Prop) -> Prop) (G : (?U -> Prop) -> Prop) (P : ?T * ?U -> Prop) (Q : ?T -> Prop) (R : ?U -> Prop), F Q -> G R -> (forall (x : ?T) (y : ?U), Q x -> R y -> P (x, y)) -> filter_prod F G P where ?T : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing Fa : (R -> Prop) -> Prop Fb : (R -> Prop) -> Prop FFa : Filter Fa FFb : Filter Fb f : R -> V k : R l : V |- Type] ?U : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing Fa : (R -> Prop) -> Prop Fb : (R -> Prop) -> Prop FFa : Filter Fa FFb : Filter Fb f : R -> V k : R l : V |- Type]
filter_imp : forall P Q : ?T -> Prop, (forall x : ?T, P x -> Q x) -> ?F P -> ?F Q where ?T : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing Fa : (R -> Prop) -> Prop Fb : (R -> Prop) -> Prop FFa : Filter Fa FFb : Filter Fb f : R -> V k : R l : V |- Type] ?F : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing Fa : (R -> Prop) -> Prop Fb : (R -> Prop) -> Prop FFa : Filter Fa FFb : Filter Fb f : R -> V k : R l : V |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?Filter : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing Fa : (R -> Prop) -> Prop Fb : (R -> Prop) -> Prop FFa : Filter Fa FFb : Filter Fb f : R -> V k : R l : V |- Filter ?F]
is_RInt_const : forall (a b : R) (v : ?V), is_RInt (fun _ : R => v) a b (scal (b - a) v) where ?V : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing Fa : (R -> Prop) -> Prop Fb : (R -> Prop) -> Prop FFa : Filter Fa FFb : Filter Fb f : R -> V k : R l : V |- NormedModule R_AbsRing]
norm_ge_0 : forall x : ?V, 0 <= norm x where ?K : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing Fa : (R -> Prop) -> Prop Fb : (R -> Prop) -> Prop FFa : Filter Fa FFb : Filter Fb f : R -> V k : R l : V |- AbsRing] ?V : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing Fa : (R -> Prop) -> Prop Fb : (R -> Prop) -> Prop FFa : Filter Fa FFb : Filter Fb f : R -> V k : R l : V |- NormedModule ?K]
SF_seq.Riemann_sum_scal : forall (a : R) (f0 : R -> ?V) (ptd : SF_seq.SF_seq), SF_seq.Riemann_sum (fun x : R => scal a (f0 x)) ptd = scal a (SF_seq.Riemann_sum f0 ptd) where ?V : [V : NormedModule R_AbsRing Fa : (R -> Prop) -> Prop Fb : (R -> Prop) -> Prop FFa : Filter Fa FFb : Filter Fb f : R -> V k : R l : V |- ModuleSpace R_Ring]

```coq
intros.
unfold is_RInt_gen in *.
intros.
apply is_RInt_gen_ext with (f0:=fun y : R => scal k (f y)); auto.
Qed.```
